nodes.text: Star Wars Science Adventures is a Legends junior novel series written by Jude Watson and K.D. Burkett. The series includes the books Emergency in Escape Pod Four and Journey Across Planet X, which were published simultaneously on February 1, 1999 by Scholastic. Star Wars Science Adventures did not receive a third entry, and its story was left unresolved.

The series is set in the year 0 ABY, and it follows droids R2-D2 and C-3PO, science droid 4B-X, and a Rebel kid named Stuart Zissu as they go on a science-based adventure. The novels also include activities which demonstrate physics from the story.
